name: Death is always an option (WIP)
description:
In this puzzle platformer you will have to die to create new platforms to get further along in the levels.

Controls:
Move: Left and Right Arrows or A & D
Jump: W or Spacebar
Stop platform moving up: Spacebar
Remove last platform: Shift
Back to main menu: Escape

Started during the Wowie! Jam 3.0 (Theme: Failure is Progress) but did not manage to get it working on time. Have been working on it since then.

Coding by: NeoN_thriller
Graphics by: Kenney Game Assets
SFX by: NeoN_thriller
Music by: Jesse Gallagher (Monumental Journey)
